nodes.bodyText: Good point, I think both are readable, but maybe (1) matches the english (if the list contains null)? And we know (1) is generally faster from short circuiting, so I thinking keeping as is, is good.
oh I'm super mistaken, everything I said was wrong. You're right, both short circuit, and the precondition does make more sense. @mpeddada1 can you try this way out?
Thanks for the suggestion! Applied the change.
